text: This album makes me seriously wonder if I‚Äôm of this planet. The praise it gets for being so mediocre amazes me. Like I‚Äôm in some snobby museum and everyone is praising this silly painting with themes that have been done to death and a style that is interesting but not really enjoyable and I‚Äôm by myself confused. People call it the greatest album of all time.  All.  Time. I guess I‚Äôll just need to be a minority. It boggles my mind some people hate the Beatles so I guess I understand those folks a little better now.
